Title: Relates to qualification for and establishment of a building construction, demolition and repair work insurance credit
Summary: Authorizes a building construction, demolition and repair work insurance tax credit for certain qualifying insurance premium payments for personal injury liability insurance and property damage liability insurance.
LawCode: Add §3463, Ins L; add §§23-a & 187-s, amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the tax law, in relation to qualification for and establishment of a building construction, demolition and repair work insurance credit
